statements: SELECT material_name, material_type, access_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE access_type = 'online';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE id = 2;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_link FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE access_type = 'offline' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video' ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, material_type, access_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type IN ('pdf', 'image') ORDER BY id ASC, material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE access_type = 'offline' AND course_id = 101 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_link FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 102 AND access_type = 'online' ORDER BY material_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, material_type, material_link FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 103 ORDER BY material_type DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, course_id, created_at FROM lecture_slides;
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT id, title FROM readings ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, slide_data FROM lecture_slides WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides, readings WHERE lecture_slides.course_id = readings.course_id;
SELECT id, title, course_id FROM lecture_slides WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE course_id = 2 AND reading_content LIKE '%database%'
SELECT title, created_at FROM lecture_slides WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT id, title, course_id FROM lecture_slides WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE course_id = 4 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM course_materials;
SELECT course_name, lecture_slides FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM online_learners ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM offline_learners WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT course_name, readings FROM course_materials WHERE course_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM course_materials
SELECT course_name, lecture_slides FROM course_materials
SELECT name, email, course_id FROM online_learners
SELECT name, location, course_name FROM offline_learners JOIN course_materials ON offline_learners.course_id = course_materials.course_id
SELECT course_id, course_name, lecture_slides, readings FROM course_materials
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_type = 'online';
SELECT course_id, reading_title FROM readings ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_url FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'lecture';
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT reading_title, reading_date FROM readings WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_type = 'online' AND user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT course_id, material_type, material_name FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 101 AND material_type = 'lecture' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY lecture_title DESC;
SELECT student_name, email_id FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_questions FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY quiz_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, lecture_slides FROM course_materials ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, lecture_slides FROM course_materials WHERE course_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM enrollments INNER JOIN students ON enrollments.student_id = students.student_id INNER JOIN course_materials ON enrollments.course_id = course_materials.course_id;
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_content LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY lecture_id DESC;
